main event: Two round white objects were sighted flying away from an aircraft in Seattle on October 8, 1957.
interesting points: The objects were the size of a dime at arm's length., They were observed flying in a short crossing course and then braking away to the southeast., The sighting lasted approximately 25 to 30 seconds., The objects appeared below and to the rear of an airliner moving from northwest to southeast., The observer was deemed reliable and visibility was excellent at the time of the sighting.
witness description: reliable military personnel involved in air defense
